TDriveInfo Record

Summary

Provides access to information on a drive.

Namespace: Spring.Utils.IO
Syntax
Delphi
type
 TDriveInfo = record
 end;

The TDriveInfo type exposes the following members.

Constructors
Show:
 NameDescription
Create(string)

Initializes a new instance of the TDriveInfo class.

Top
Properties
Show:
 NameDescription
AvailableFreeSpace

Gets the amount of available free space on a drive.

DriveFormat

Gets the name of the file system, such as NTFS or FAT32.

DriveType

Gets the drive type.

DriveTypeString

Gets the drive type.

IsReady

Gets a value indicating whether a drive is ready.

Name

Gets the name of a drive.

RootDirectory

Gets the root directory of a drive.

TotalFreeSpace

Gets the total amount of free space available on a drive.

TotalSize

Gets the total size of storage space on a drive.

VolumeLabel

Gets or sets the volume label of a drive.

Top
Methods
Show:
 NameDescription
CheckIsReady

Checks whether a drive is ready.

GetDrives

Retrieves the drive names of all logical drives on a computer.

Refresh

Refreshes the information of a drive.

Top
Remarks

Use the static GetDrives method to retrieve all drives of the computer.

Notes to Callers

Caller must use the IsReady property to check whether the drive is ready before accessing other members. Otherwise, an Spring|EIOException exception will be raised if it is not ready.

Thread Safety
Public static members of this type are thread safe. Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.
